skill.name: linear-issues-read
skill.description: List and get Linear issues via CLI (read-only operations)
skill.summary: List and get Linear issues via CLI (read-only operations)
skill.author: Bind

security_audit.summary: Read-only Linear API client using official SDK. Accesses LINEAR_API_KEY environment variable for authentication and makes network calls only to Linear's official API endpoints. No code execution, no file system access beyond its own directory, and no data exfiltration patterns detected.

content.user_title: Read Linear issues from command line
content.value_statement: Quickly view and filter Linear issues without leaving your terminal. Access issue details, search by team or assignee, and get structured output for further processing.
actual_capabilities: List all issues with optional filters by team, project, assignee, or status
Get detailed information for a specific issue by ID or UUID
Output results as formatted tables or JSON for scripting
Resolve team names, user names, and labels to IDs automatically
Limit the number of results returned
limitations: Read-only operations only - cannot create, update, or delete issues
Does not support custom issue views or saved searches

use_cases.title: Find specific issues

best_practices: Store LINEAR_API_KEY securely in environment variables or .env files, never in source code
Use --json flag when piping output to other command-line tools for reliable parsing
Combine multiple filters like --team and --assignee to narrow down results quickly
anti_patterns: Using this skill for write operations - it is read-only and will fail silently
Hardcoding API keys in scripts or sharing them in chat contexts
Assuming issue IDs are always in ENG-XXX format - some teams use different prefixes

faq.question: Which AI tools support this skill?
faq.answer: This skill works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code for reading Linear issues via command line.

faq.question: What is the maximum number of issues I can retrieve?
faq.answer: You can retrieve up to 100 issues by using --limit 100. The default is 25 issues.

faq.question: How do I set up the Linear API key?
faq.answer: Get your key from Linear Settings > API > Personal API Keys and set it as LINEAR_API_KEY in your environment or .env file.

faq.question: Is my Linear data safe with this skill?
faq.answer: Yes. This is a read-only skill that only calls Linear's official API with your credentials. No data is stored or transmitted elsewhere.

faq.question: Why am I getting an unknown team error?
faq.answer: Team names are case-insensitive but must match exactly. Use the exact team name from Linear Settings > Teams.

faq.question: How does this compare to using the Linear web app?
faq.answer: This skill provides faster access for common queries and enables scripting. The web app offers more features like drag-and-drop boards and rich text editing.
